channel.title: 1 Questions (Pleae Look)
channel.description:
Ok On My Server Hans Give Out The Skillcapes But Their Nulls.. Cuz I Dont Have The Orignal Client But How Do I Change What He Gives.
Cuz I Can Change The Nulls He Gives To The Skillcape Codes My Client Has To Give Skillcapes Insted Of Nulls.

item.title: 1 Questions (Pleae Look)
item.dc:creator: @haha_dumball haha dumball
item.description:
@haha_dumball wrote:

right
you need to go on your server folder
and go to
shops.cfg
i sugest using notepad ++ because its easy
then find the shop name and the item codes will b there withh ammounts
example: 4645 100

4645 is the item 100 is ammount
so change the codes
use normal team cape codes i have a list of the capes they should work

4317 agilty cape (t)
4319 attack cape (t)
4321 firemaking cape (t)
4325 cook cape (t)
4327 crafting cape (t)
4329 defence cape (t)
4331 farming cape (t)
4333 runecrafting cape (t)
4335 fishing cape (t)
4337 fletching cape (t)
4339 herblore cape (t)
4341 hitpoint cape (t)
4343 magic cape (t)
4317 prayer cape (t)
4351 range cape (t)
4353 woodcutting cape (t)
4355 slayer cape (t)
4357 smithing cape (t)
4359 strength cape (t)
4361 thieving cape (t)
4363 summoning cape (t)

then save it and then compile and log back on and your away any problems ask and ill elaborate

Read full topic
